content.rendered:
The Genetic Preservation biopsy is a simple procedure that any veterinarian can do.  We recommend first reaching out to your pet’s personal veterinarian, as they know you and your pet best. If your personal veterinarian is unwilling to take the biopsy sample, you can enter your location below to search our Veterinary Network and find a veterinarian who has previously performed a biopsy or is familiar with the biopsy procedure. Please keep in mind that some veterinarians on this list may not currently be accepting new clients or may not have availability. Advanced planning is recommended whenever possible.

Are you a veterinarian?  Are you interested in learning more? Click here to access our Veterinarian Resources page.

      For our European clients, Gemini Genetics, is a preferred partner. https://www.geminigenetics.com/
